pr_title: Ensures gRPC client response callbacks happen in invocation context

timeline.message:
Ensures gRPC client response callbacks happen in invocation context

Same as #1067 (HTTP), except for gRPC.

Fixes #2981

timeline.bodyText: Not sure if gRPC being Java 8 means we would prefer try/resources here but just in case
timeline.author: anuraaga

replies.bodyText: I didn't move over the retrolambda comment. we still support gRPC 1.2 :P
replies.author: codefromthecrypt

replies.bodyText: I will make a comment in the pom.xml in next change which is that when we bring the floor version up to v1.16.0, we can bump to Java 1.7 and use try/resources naturally (unless retrolambda still complains)
replies.author: codefromthecrypt

replies.bodyText: wait that's already there.. I'll just add the comment :)
